# The `R600MCCodeEmitter.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/r600">R600</a> code emitter produces machine code that can be executed directly on the GPU device. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

The <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/r600">R600</a> code emitter produces machine code that can be executed directly on the GPU device.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600defines-h/#a1ad904deac6dbd960c5c7a473503deb7">HAS&#95;NATIVE&#95;OPERANDS</a>(MCII.get(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode()).TSFlags))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MRI.getEncodingValue(MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a94abf618eb8001b802910ab872a7d1d9">getReg</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> getHWReg(MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a94abf618eb8001b802910ab872a7d1d9">getReg</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#ae23b2e8269fe15dbe5ebb3394438960c">isExpr</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We put rodata at the end of code section, then map the entire</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// code secetion as vtx buf. Thus the section relative address is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// correct one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Each R600 literal instruction has two operands</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can&#39;t easily get the order of the current one, so compare against</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the first one and adjust offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> offset = (&amp;MO == &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0)) ? 0 : 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Fixups.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup/#abdf37854fa6eb68017b96486df443a32">MCFixup::create</a>(offset, MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#ac9408fbc60922d24b01c1efcbd4ba52b">getExpr</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a84cef097f15848752272d38769011f58a8b2acba82b6d0830ab47d67eb8f1ccf0">FK&#95;SecRel&#95;4</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getLoc()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a4509c43893edc940979f690c468664c1">getImm</a>();</span></CodeLine>
